articles.title: Adding salt to foods at the table increases risk of premature death - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: People who add extra salt to their food at the table are at higher risk of dying prematurely from any cause, according to a study of more than 500,000 people, published in the European Heart Journal today (Monday).
